thread.title: SwitchRay to Speak at ITEXPO in Anaheim on IP-PBX Fraud Prevention
thread.title_full: SwitchRay to Speak at ITEXPO in Anaheim on IP-PBX Fraud Prevention - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SwitchRay to Speak at ITEXPO in Anaheim on IP-PBX Fraud Prevention
text:
SwitchRay Hosts Booth at ITEXPO with Live Fraud Detection Demo
Mission Viejo, CA (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
SwitchRay, a leading vendor of telecommunications software, announced today they would be speaking on the hot topic of PBX fraud at ITEXPO, to be held at the Anaheim Convention Center, October 6-8.
SwitchRay’s Chief Technology Officer, Dr. Colin Ayer, will speak at the October 7th 12:30pm panel, “Protecting Carrier Losses Due to IP-PBX Fraud”. This panel takes a close look at how fraudsters find ways into PBX systems and what businesses need to do to take the necessary precautions to ensure their revenue is protected. According to the CFCA, PBX fraud has reached epidemic proportions, equating to billions of dollars each year in lost revenue.
SwitchRay will also host booth #921 to showcase its Class 4 and Class 5 softswitches, web portal and real-time PBX fraud detection solution. SwitchRay’s softswitch solutions include advanced routing capabilities, session border control and least cost routing. With offices and sales support around the globe, SwitchRay’s stable scalable communication platforms provide businesses with the functionality they need to drive costs down and maximize revenue.
ITEXPO is one of the largest communications and technology events that brings together the entire industry community for a week of business-building with some of the most powerful solutions.
“We look forward to customers coming to our booth and experiencing first-hand our state of the art Class 4 and Class 5 softswitches, our newly launched web portal and our live fraud detection demo” commented, Steve Petilli, CEO, SwitchRay. “Our goal has always to been to address the evolving needs of our customers and provide them with cutting-edge technology and dependable business solutions.”
For more information on how to schedule a meeting at ITEXPO, please contact us at info@switchray.com or visit our website at http://www.switchray.com .
About SwitchRay Inc.
SwitchRay Inc. delivers state-of-the-art communication service platforms to telecom carriers worldwide. Their mission is to provide highly reliable and scalable products that are rich in functionality, allowing its customers to build successful businesses by increasing their profits and lowering their total cost of operations. With its keen attention to detail and unwavering commitment to exceptional customer service, SwitchRay optimizes communication and builds a brighter future for the world to connect. Headquartered in California and founded in 2012, SwitchRay acquired the products previously marketed and sold by Aloe Systems and Mera, enhancing the products with additional features and functionality. For more information on SwitchRay’s communications service platforms, please visit http://www.switchray.com and/or email info@switchray.com.
About ITEXPO WEST:
ITEXPO is one of the largest communications and technology events that brings together the entire communications and technology community for a week of business-building with some of the most powerful solutions on the market today. Enterprise, government and SMB end users, resellers, service providers, manufacturers, developers, media and analysts gather to examine solutions in conference sessions, demo products and services live on the expo floor, and forge beneficial business relationships.
For inquiries, contact:
Dina Scaglione, Director Marketing & Sales Operations
949.910.9401
